TITLE: Why private equity has been involved in every recent bank deal
SUMMARY: New York Community Bank's $1 billion-plus capital raise is the latest example of private equity players coming to rescue a regional bank.

TITLE: What the SEC vote on climate disclosures means for investors
SUMMARY: The rule passed in a 3-2 vote but is watered down from the initial version proposed in March 2022.

TITLE: NYCB shares rebound after troubled regional bank announces $1 billion capital raise
SUMMARY: The regional bank stock has been under pressure this year after disclosing potential losses in its loan book.

TITLE: Watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell testify live on Capitol Hill before House panel
SUMMARY: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell appears Wednesday before the House Financial Services Committee.

TITLE: Powell reinforces position that the Fed is not ready to start cutting interest rates
SUMMARY: Powell said policymakers remain attentive to the risks that inflation poses and don't want to ease up too quickly.

TITLE: Retirement prospects for women can be ‘pretty bleak,’ expert says — but there are ways to prepare
SUMMARY: Women make less money than men and live longer, which can dim their odds for a financially secure retirement, experts said.

TITLE: China's top securities regulator vows to 'strictly' crack down on market manipulators
SUMMARY: Ensuring fairness, especially in a market dominated by smaller investors, is the regulator's core task, said Wu Qing, chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

TITLE: China's central bank governor says there's room to cut banks' reserve requirements
SUMMARY: The heads of China's central bank and economic planning agency signaled that authorities would be willing to take further steps to support growth.

TITLE: Fed Chair Powell testifying to House on Wednesday. What investors are expecting
SUMMARY: Markets are intent on getting more clarity about how the central bank plans on proceeding with monetary policy this year.

TITLE: British neobank Monzo raises $430 million in Alphabet-led round to relaunch in the U.S.
SUMMARY: Monzo has raised $430 million in a new funding round led by CapitalG, the independent venture arm of Google parent company Alphabet.

TITLE: New CFPB rule caps banks' credit card late fees at $8
SUMMARY: By cutting late fees to $8 from an average of around $32, more than 45 million card users would save an average of $220 annually, the CFPB said in a release.

TITLE: Nigeria battles to halt spiraling currency crisis and rising food insecurity
SUMMARY: Nigeria is battling to contain a historic currency crisis and soaring inflation, with the IMF warning that almost one in 10 face food insecurity.

TITLE: Some NYCB deposits may be a flight risk after Moody’s downgrades ratings again
SUMMARY: Moody's slashed one of New York Community Bank's key ratings for the second time in a month.

TITLE: 'Last chance saloon': UK finance minister expected to pledge pre-election tax cuts
SUMMARY: Economists expect U.K. Finance Minister Jeremy Hunt to use a small fiscal windfall to deliver a modest package of tax cuts at his Spring Budget on Wednesday.

TITLE: ‘One of the most important innovations in investing’: TMX CEO jumps deeper into ETFs
SUMMARY: The Toronto Stock Exchange’s parent company acquired ETF education company VettaFi.  According to CEO John McKenzie, it will help with ETF growth worldwide.

TITLE: Wall Street is worried about NYCB's loan losses and deposit levels as stock sinks below $4
SUMMARY: NYCB restated recent quarterly earnings lower by $2.4 billion, formally replaced its CEO and delayed the release of a key annual report.

TITLE: Shares of NYCB falls 25% after bank discloses 'internal controls' issue, CEO change
SUMMARY: The regional bank has been under pressure in recent months, in part due to concerns about its exposure to commercial real estate.

TITLE: 'Ghosting' gets more common in the job market: It's not a 'passing fad,' report says
SUMMARY: Job applicants and employers are increasingly ghosting each other, data suggests. That behavior may be unwise, according to career experts.

TITLE: Geely-backed car tech company takes aim at Nvidia's growing auto business
SUMMARY: The electric car rush is creating demand for in-vehicle tech that companies from Nvidia to Huawei are chasing.

TITLE: Paramount falls short of revenue expectations but posts surprise profit, strong streaming results
SUMMARY: Paramount+ reached 67.5 million subscribers during the period, a net increase of 4.1 million, and recorded 69% revenue growth year over year.

TITLE: Online trading platform Webull is set to go public via a $7.3 billion SPAC deal
SUMMARY: The New York-based online brokerage will combine with SK Growth Opportunities Corporation in the second half of the year.

TITLE: In wake of AT&T outage, consumer advocates say you should always ask for money back if there’s a blackout
SUMMARY: AT&T says it's issuing account credits automatically due to a service blackout. It generally behooves consumers to ask for such reimbursements proactively.

TITLE: China doubles down on national security, expanding its state secrets law
SUMMARY: Chinese President Xi Jinping on Tuesday signed an order to formally adopt revisions to a law on "Guarding State Secrets," according to state media.

TITLE: Baylor University outperformed the Ivy League in university endowment performance rankings. Here’s how
SUMMARY: Baylor University’s Chief Investment Officer David Morehead takes an active approach to managing the school’s endowment.

TITLE: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon says AI is not just hype — 'This is real'
SUMMARY: The Wall Street executive told CNBC's Leslie Picker on Monday that artificial intelligence is not just a passing fad and will "be used in almost every job."

TITLE: Jamie Dimon on Capital One's $35.3 billion Discover acquisition: 'Let them compete'
SUMMARY: Dimon acknowledged that if regulators approve the Capital One-Discover deal, his bank will be eclipsed as the nation's biggest credit card lender.

TITLE: Major airlines raised fees for checked bags. Here are 7 ways to cut costs
SUMMARY: Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue Airways and United Airlines increased checked-bag fees in 2024. There are ways for travelers to cut those expenses.

TITLE: Berkshire shares slip after hitting all-time high on big profit gain
SUMMARY: The conglomerate on Saturday posted strong fourth-quarter operating earnings of $8.481 billion, about 28% higher than the $6.625 billion in the year-ago period

TITLE: After doubts about Alibaba's future, co-founder Joe Tsai says: 'We're back'
SUMMARY: Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba is back on track to be a top market player after a period of pressure, co-founder Joe Tsai told CNBC's Emily Tan.

TITLE: Xiaomi bets big on its new electric vehicle — targets 20 million premium users
SUMMARY: Xiaomi is putting a premium price on its first electric car because it already has about 20 million users in that segment, Group President Weibing Lu told CNBC.
